external_references.description: Shinji Robert Arasawa, Joshua Aquino, Charles Steven Derion, Juhn Emmanuel Atanque, Francisrey Joshua Castillo, John Carlo Marquez, Henry Salcedo, John Rainier Navato, Arianne Dela Cruz, Raymart Yambot & Ian Kenefick. (2024, January 9). Black Basta-Affiliated Water Curupira’s Pikabot Spam Campaign. Retrieved July 17, 2024.

objects.description: [Water Curupira Pikabot Distribution](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0037) distributed a PDF attachment containing a malicious link to a [Pikabot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1145) installer.(Citation: TrendMicro Pikabot 2024)
